remarks: Multiplication of both sides of 'less than' by a positive number. Theorem I.19 of [Apostol] p. 20.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2016.)
statement:
ltmul1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltmul1d.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
ltmul1d.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR+ ) $.
ltdiv1dd.4 $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
ltmul2dd $p |- ( ph -> ( C x. A ) < ( C x. B ) ) $.
